Description: Affordable housing supply statistics (AHS) 2017-18. Live tables - 1006C,1006S, 1006aC,1006aS, 1006bS, 1006bC, 1007C,1007S, 1008C,1008S, 1009
Name: Tables 1006 to 1009: additional affordable homes provided by type of scheme and local authority, England (MCHLG)
Notes: Very Similar to Table 1000: additional affordable homes provided by type of scheme, England (MHCLG) but broken down by Local Authority Area (only difference is addition of Geography dimension).
Producer: Ministry for Housing, Communities and Local Government (MHCLG)
Route from landing page to data: Data on this page identified under heading Live Tables labelled as Tables 1006 to 1009: additional affordable homes provided by type of scheme and local authority, England
Sizing Notes: Data will be provided direct by MHCLG, so should be simple to work with.
